name: Space Game (Hoborg)
description:
WIP Spaceship construction game.

Controls:

Click Tile (black square) and Thruster (black square with arrow) in top left to select which you will place next. Place piece with left click. Press R to rotate (90 degrees anti-clockwise each R press) the next thruster placement. Click the WASD keys to select which key activates the next thruster you place. The C marker is the centre of gravity of your ship.
